conbody.p: The offeror shall identify how it will give the Government the ability to disseminate base software loads as well as updates to field/depot support assets for loading and provisioning, in accordance with PWS section <XX.XX>.

The Government will evaluate the proposal for how and the extent to which the offeror will ensure the Governmentâ€™s ability to disseminate base software loads as well as updates to field/depot support assets for loading and provisioning.
